meanings.definition: Living together in the same household.
meanings.sent1: My sister is my coresident, and we share a room.
meanings.sent2: The coresident family members all contribute to the household chores.
meanings.sent3: The coresident cat and dog have become best friends.
meanings.sent4: In our coresident community, we support each other like family.
meanings.sent5: Being coresident with my grandparents has taught me valuable life lessons.

meanings.definition: A person who lives in the same residence as another.
meanings.sent1: My coresident at the dorm is a friendly student from another country.
meanings.sent2: The coresident upstairs always plays loud music late at night.
meanings.sent3: The coresident in apartment 3B has a quirky collection of garden gnomes.
meanings.sent4: As a coresident of this building, I feel a sense of belonging to the community.
meanings.sent5: The coresident next door is a talented musician who practices every day.
